This is not hardcore, so don't rush to get that KY ready.  This is a very good "pre-foreplay" flick, to get your potential lover in the mood, with more "suggest" scenes than "explicit"  Let's, of course, be pragmatic about the ramped inaccuracies out there, regarding the difference between eroticism and porn.  This flick is eroticism.  Must we also say, that there's no harm in watching others enjoy themselves?  Afterall, lovemaking and porn are truly only differentiated by frame of mind.  If a couple mutually agree on an activity, then there's no cheating, either.  If you're a religious person, then don't watch this.  But hey...God created our bodies to DO THIS!
Dvd movie is fine for adults, has some named actors/actress in this film.

Was advertised as being in good condition. Was recorded in EP speed. No amount of

A women wants more sex with her cop husband but he generally ignors her. He loves her but is an honest cop and the pressures of his job are getting to him. His desperate wife finally seduces a cable tv guy and her cop husband catches her in bed with the cable guy. He tells her how hot he finds that and has super sex with her and suggest she has more affairs so he can watch. She has numerous affairs with guys as her husband tapes them and gets his rocks off with her afterward. The trouble comes when she has sex with a thug who works for the man her husband is trying to get off the streets. This leads to a blackmail plot. A very good sexploitation movie in which a nude Shannon Whirry is prominently displayed. I'd have given it 5 stars but the soundtrack on my dvd import sounds like it was recordeed at three quarter speed.
